sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import BannerImg from "../../Assets/coffee-white.png"; import { GrSecure } from "react-icons/gr"; import { IoFastFood } from "react-icons/io5"; import { GiFoodTruck } from "react-icons/gi"; import BgImg from "../../Assets/coffee-white.png"; const bgImage = { backgroundImage: `url(${BgImg})`, backgroundColor: "#270c03", backgroundPosition: "center", backgroundRepeat: "no-repeat", backgroundSize: "cover", height: "100%", width: "100%", }; export const Banner = () => { return ( <>
